This will kill the process permanetly and save your ressources. 5) Disable Forced Reboot after Update ‚Äî Blocks Windows from enforcing a reboot after updates that require one. 6) Disable Lockscreen ‚Äî Turns off the Windows 10 lockscreen. 7) Disable Telemetry ‚Äî Turns off Windows 10 Telemetry. 8) Disable Unnecessary Services ‚Äî This disables the MapsBroker, DoSvc and Wsearch services 9) Enable Defender Malware Protection ‚Äî   Enables Windows malware Protection. 10)Enable Secure Microsoft Edge Settings ‚Äî Tweaks Microsoft Edge for security. Changes include turning of Flash and Cortana, enabling continuous browsing, and more. 11)Get Back Old Vertical Desktop Icon Distance ‚Äî  Changes the vertical icon spacing on the desktop. 12)Hide Cortana ‚Äî Disables Cortana, and with it web searches and other search related parameters. The Microsoft way of disabling Cortana. 13)Hide OneDrive ‚Äî Hides OneDrive and disables several related settings. 14)Re-enable Cortana Completely ‚Äî This preferences turns Cortana on again. 15)Uninstall Unnecessary Apps ‚Äî Removes ten apps that Windows 10 ships with including 3D Builder, Skype App, Getting Started, or Voice Recorder. 16)Enable Administrator Account ‚Äî This preference enables the hidden administrator account in Windows. 17)Enable Standby instead of Hibernate ‚Äî Switch powerstate from hibernation (slow) to standby . 18)Get apps access for Administrator Account ‚Äî Enable access to applications for the administrator account.
